# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

We currently only provide security updates for the latest version of the application running on the `main` branch.

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| Main    | :white_check_mark: |
| < 1.0   | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

**Please do not open a public GitHub issue for security vulnerabilities.**

If you discover a security-related issue, please report it privately. You can report vulnerabilities by:

1. Opening a **Draft Security Advisory** on GitHub (under the Security tab).
2. Or by emailing: **aravindr597+harmony@gmail.com** (replace this with your actual email).

We will acknowledge your report within 48 hours and provide a timeline for a fix.
